ProjectsPage.title: My Projects
ProjectsPage.description: Below are some of the projects I've worked on or completed. Each project includes information about the technologies used and links related to the project.
ProjectsPage.HotelOrderAppDesc: QR code based hotel order app. Customers can scan the QR code on their table to access the menu, place orders, and request the bill directly from their smartphones. The app features a user-friendly interface, secure payment options, and real-time order tracking to enhance the dining experience.
ProjectsPage.DentwiseDesc: A comprehensive dental clinic management system with AI and AI voice assistance. It features appointment scheduling, patient records, billing, and real-time notifications to streamline clinic operations.
ProjectsPage.ExpenseTrackerDesc: A comprehensive expense tracking application that helps users manage their finances effectively. It features income and expense tracking, budgeting tools, and insightful financial reports.
ProjectsPage.NoteForgeDesc: A comprehensive note-taking application that helps users organize their thoughts effectively. It features rich text editing, tagging, and powerful search capabilities.
ProjectsPage.BasicEcommerceDesc: A basic e-commerce platform built with the MERN stack, offering a variety of products for online shopping. It features user-friendly navigation, secure Stripe payment options, and a seamless shopping experience. The platform includes an admin panel for managing products, orders, and payments.
ProjectsPage.ArzuAmberEcommerceDesc: A sophisticated e-commerce platform for Arzu Amber, featuring a wide range of products. The platform offers user-friendly navigation, secure payment options, and a seamless shopping experience. It includes an admin panel for managing products, orders, and payments.

TimelinePage.title: Project Process
TimelinePage.subtitle: Discover the project process step by step.

steps.title: Needs Analysis & Planning
steps.content: Before starting the project, I have a detailed meeting with the client/team and clarify the requirements. User stories, goals, and priorities are determined. The work plan and roadmap are created with tools like Trello or Notion.

steps.title: Design & Mockup
steps.content: Wireframes and mockups are prepared for the interface. If there is a UI/UX team, I collaborate with them; otherwise, I create basic designs myself using Figma. Color palette, typography, and component structure are determined.

steps.title: Frontend Setup
steps.content: At the initial stage, React or Next.js is set up. UI development starts quickly with Tailwind CSS. Component structure and page architecture are planned. UI libraries (shadcn/ui, PrimeReact) are integrated.

steps.title: Backend Setup
steps.content: Node.js and Express.js are configured for the server side. API endpoints, middleware, and error management are set up. If necessary, TypeScript is added for type safety.

steps.title: Database & ORM Integration
steps.content: MongoDB or PostgreSQL is selected and the data model is designed. Prisma or Drizzle ORM is used for database connection. Migration and seed operations are performed, data relationships are modeled.

steps.title: Authentication & Security
steps.content: Authentication systems such as JWT, Clerk, or Better Auth are integrated for user management. Authorization, encryption, and secure session management are ensured.

steps.title: State & Data Management
steps.content: Global state management is created with Redux or context API. Appropriate structures are established for API calls, data caching, and asynchronous operations.

steps.title: Test & Quality Assurance
steps.content: Unit and integration tests are written using tools like Jest and React Testing Library. The stability and security of the application are checked with manual and automated tests.

steps.title: Deploy & Versioning
steps.content: When the project is complete, deployment is performed on Vercel, Netlify, or my own server. Git and GitHub are used for version control; CI/CD processes are integrated if available.

steps.title: Documentation & Delivery
steps.content: In the final stage, README, API documentation, and user guides are prepared for the project. The project is delivered to the client/team, and the feedback phase is started.

AboutPage.name: Berk Certel
AboutPage.title: Full Stack Developer
AboutPage.bio: I am a Full Stack Developer based in Antalya, passionate about crafting robust and scalable web applications. My journey spans two universities in Computer Programming, where I built a strong foundation in modern technologies. I focus on delivering high-quality solutions and enjoy turning complex ideas into seamless digital experiences.

aboutMe: I'm a Full Stack Developer living in Antalya. I specialize in building modern and scalable web applications.
